name: Broken Shadows
body:
### What is Broken Shadows?
Broken Shadows is a puzzle platformer centered around the idea of visibility and manipulating (you guessed it) light. In its later stages, the game will feature non-linear exploration, hazards to avoid, enemies to defeat, and various ways with which to beat an area. The game comes with a built-in map editor to create custom levels.

### Feature Progression
- ~~Tile Manipulation~~ _Done!_
- ~~Visibility~~ _Done!_
- ~~Map Editor~~ _Done!_
- Custom Level Saving/Loading
- Hazards
- Enemies
- Exploration

### Authors and Contributors
Game Developer - @APlagman

### Contact
For professional inquiries, please contact me [here](mailto:alexplagman@gmail.com).

Otherwise, please feel free to visit [my website](http://www.alexplagman.com) for more of my information and work!
